name: Dreamy Collector
description: An app to track who is on your island and who you want to replace them with.
skill: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node, Express, Passport.js, Bcrypt.js, Heroku, Sequelize, Animal Crossing NPM

name: Pretty Dorky
description: A simple RPG where you choose your hero to run through a server farm and battle our coding enemies.
skill: React, Firebase/Firestore, MongoDB, Mongoose, Axios, Bootstrap

name: Weather Dashboard
description: Plan your vacation wardrobe easier with the ability to look up the current and extended 5-day forecast for your vacation destination.
skill: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Open Weather API

name: Forgotten Grotto
description: A quick quiz to help you find your way to the Forgotten Grotto. Quiz is timed and has a high scores page to track your progress.

name: Daily Planner
description: A calendar app to enter daily appoints and tasks. Dynamically updates with current time and saves using local storage.

name: Password Generator
description: A randomized password generator where the user inputs parameters and the app returns a password that fits the requirments.

name: Have it Your Way
description: An express app that tracks your burger intake and helps you remember your favorites.
skill: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Handlebars, Express, MySql

name: Thoughts on Thoughts
description: A notetaker app that that will help you remember all those things that fly out of you head as soon as you turn around.
skill: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, Express, Util, UUID
